posts._title: Andy Sidaris – Day of the Warrior (1996)
posts.title: Day of the Warrior
posts.excerpt: The Agency’s computer database is compromised by a powerful criminal named “The Warrior”. Now, with the list of all the undercover agents’ identities in hand, he is going after them, one by one.

posts.title: Catch-22
posts.excerpt: Plot Outline: A man is trying desperately to be certified insane during World War II, so he can stop flying missions. posts.title: Galini
posts.excerpt: The film is based on the novella by the same name, written by Ilias Venezis and reflects the innermost bitterness of the Asia Minor Disaster. posts._title: Kira Muratova – Astenicheskiy sindrom AKA Asthenic Syndrome (1990)
posts.title: Astenicheskiy sindrom
posts.excerpt: Quote:In the old days it was called hypochrondria, or black melancholia. Now, apparently, it’s termed the Asthenic Syndrome. Whatever it is, Nikolai, a teacher has got it, and it’s not much fun.
